definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: (Aram. and poet.) go down, descend (Aram. [[נְחֵת]], nh.t; Palm. [[נחת]] Lzb:323);—
go down, descend, to attack Je 21:13; into Shₑ’ôl Job 21:13.
fig. descend in chastisement Ps 38:3 (hand of ´[[י]]; ‖

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: v. infr.); sq. [[בְּ]] descend into i.e. make impression on, Pr 17:10 (of reproof).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[נִחֲתוּ]] sq. [[בְּ]] = penetrate Ps 38:3, (of arrows of ´[[י]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וְנִחַת]] 2Sa 22:35 (v. Ges:§ 145. 7); = 3 fs. [[וְנִחֲתָה]] Ps 18:35; Inf. abs. [[נַחֵת]] Ps 65:11; —cause to descend = press down, acc. to most, in [[קֶשֶׁת נְחוּשָׁה זְדׂעׂתָָי]] ´[[וְנ]] 2Sa 22:35 = Ps 18:35 so that my arms press down, stretch, a bow of bronze, but dub.; Bu conj. Hiph. [[יַנְחִת]]; HPS [[וַיׇּ֫שֶׁת]] and makes my arms a bow of bronze; of pressing down, smoothing out, furrows of land Ps 65:11.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Imv. [[הַנְחַת]] Joe 4:11 thither bring down thy heroes, ´[[י]]! (on form cf. Ges:§ 64 R. 3 Kö:i. 314 f.).
